nodes.text: Peaches was a male Durni that lived during the time of the Galactic Civil War and was the pet of the Bith Carson Vance.
During the Festival of Love in 1 ABY, Vance and Peaches were present in Tyrena on the planet Corellia, when Peaches went missing. However, a spacer soon found the creature and returned it to Vance.
Peaches appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
